Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class Tide

The main Tide class to initialize.

Constructors

Tide(vendorId, serverUrl)

Initialize Tide.

Declaration
new Tide(vendorId, serverUrl)
Parameters
Type Name Description
String vendorId

Your designated VendorId in which you will operate
String serverUrl

The endpoint of your backend Tide server

Functions

register(username, password, email, orkIds)

Create a new Tide account.

This will generate a new Tide user using the provided username and providing a keypaid to manage the account (user-secret).

Declaration
function register(username, password, email, orkIds)
Parameters
Type Name Description
String username

Plain text username of the new user
String password

Plain text password of the new user
String email

The recovery email to be used by the user.
Array orkIds

The desired ork nodes to be used for registration. An account can only be activated when all ork nodes have confirmed they have stored the shard.
Returns
Type Description
tide-js.AESKey
  • The users keys to be used on the data

login(username, password)

Login to a previously created Tide account. The account must be fully enabled by the vendor before use.

This will generate a new Tide user using the provided username and providing a keypaid to manage the account (user-secret).

Declaration
function login(username, password)
Parameters
Type Name Description
String username

Plain text username of the user
String password

Plain text password of the user
Returns
Type Description
tide-js.AESKey
  • The users keys to be used on the data

logout()

Strips all local user data from the browser.

Declaration
function logout()

encrypt(msg)

Encrypt a string with the logged in user keys.

This action requires a logged in user.

Declaration
function encrypt(msg)
Parameters
Type Name Description
String msg

The string you wish to encrypt using the user keys
Returns
Type Description
String
  • The encrypted payload

decrypt(cipher)

Decrypt an encrypted string with the logged in user keys.

This action requires a logged in user.

Declaration
function decrypt(cipher)
Parameters
Type Name Description
String cipher

The encrypted string you wish to decrypt using the user keys
Returns
Type Description
String
  • The plain text message

recover(username)

Send a request to the ORK nodes used by the user to email them recovery shards. This is step 1 in a 2 step process to recover the user keys.

Declaration
function recover(username)
Parameters
Type Name Description
String username

The username of the user who wishes to recover

reconstruct(username, shares, newPass)

Login to a previously created Tide account. The account must be fully enabled by the vendor before use.

This will generate a new Tide user using the provided username and providing a keypaid to manage the account (user-secret).

Declaration
function reconstruct(username, shares, newPass)
Parameters
Type Name Description
String username

Plain text username of the user
Array shares

An array of shares sent to the users email(s)
String newPass

The new password of the user
